text: Stefano Locatelli (born February 26, 1989 in Bergamo) is an Italian former racing cyclist. ==Major results== ;2009 :1st Gran Premio Palio del Recioto :2nd Cronoscalata Gardone Val Trompia-Prati di Caregno ;2010 :2nd GP Capodarco :5th Overall Girobio ;2012 :6th Overall Tour de Langkawi :6th GP Industria e Commercio Artigianato Carnaghese ;2013 :9th Overall Giro del Trentino ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2012 ! scope="col" | 2013 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia | style="text-align:center;"|DNF | style="text- align:center;"|102 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |— |— |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists
title: Stefano Locatelli
